dialogue: In the event of a fire we'll rely on your leadership to get us out safely.
Let me see if I understand this...
You're the leader when it involves uninformed decisions in return for huge stock options.
But I'm the leader when it comes to risking death in a highrise inferno while you scramble over the ashen backs of fallen co-workers.
What makes you think your life is worth more than mine?
I've got stock options and you're a floor warden.
